root.name: readBytes()
root.description: Reads the response from the server as an array of bytes. This must be preceeded by a GET() or POST() that returns successfully. This method can either fill a byte array that you provide, or create a byte array and return it. It is more memory efficient to create a byte array and provide it to readBytes(), as you can re-use the same byte array. If you provide your own byte array, the method will return the number of bytes filled in the array.

parameter.label: buffer
parameter.description: byte[]: array of bytes to fill
